title: Refactor verification: behavioral equivalence beyond happy path
trigger: When user asks 'how do you verify the before and after are the same' during refactoring

signals.user_question: How do you verify that the after and before is the same?
signals.same_signature_trap: Functions with identical parameters can have inverted semantics
signals.precondition_mapping: Need to verify all precondition states, not just happy path
signals.semantic_mismatch: createX vs getX, ensureX vs requireX have different behaviors
